The '''Twenty-first Hall''' was a great hall on the [[Seventh Level]] in the [[North End]] of the [[Dwarves|Dwarf]] realm of [[Moria]]. 


[[Balin's Colony]] reclaimed the Hall from the [[Orcs]]. There is a mention that there was a "good air" and "the shaft was clear", and allowed the Dwarves to watch their surroundings.

Years later the [[Fellowship of the Ring|Fellowship]] camped in the hall for the night on their trek through Moria.  [[Gandalf]] was able to identify the hall after the Fellowship had found the [[Chamber of Mazarbul]].<ref>{{FR|II5}}</ref>

==Portrayal in adaptations== 
[[File:The Lord of the Rings Online - Twenty-First Hall.jpeg|right|thumb|The Twenty-First Hall in ''Lord of the Rings Online'']]
'''2007: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'':'''
:The Twenty-first Hall is the central base of operations for the Iron Garrison.
